code: import React from'react';import{Dialog,DialogTitle,DialogContent,DialogActions,TextField,Button}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AgentModal=_ref=>{let{open,handleClose,handleSave}=_ref;const[agentData,setAgentData]=React.useState({name:'',role:'',goal:'',backstory:'',expected_output:''});const handleChange=field=>event=>{setAgentData({...agentData,[field]:event.target.value});};const handleSubmit=()=>{handleSave(agentData);setAgentData({name:'',role:'',goal:'',backstory:'',expected_output:''});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dialog,{open:open,onClose:handleClose,maxWidth:"md",fullWidth:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogTitle,{children:"Adicionar Novo Agente"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DialogContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{autoFocus:true,margin:"dense",label:"Nome do Agente",fullWidth:true,value:agentData.name,onChange:handleChange('name')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{margin:"dense",label:"Fun\xE7\xE3o/Papel",fullWidth:true,value:agentData.role,onChange:handleChange('role')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{margin:"dense",label:"Objetivo",fullWidth:true,multiline:true,rows:2,value:agentData.goal,onChange:handleChange('goal')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{margin:"dense",label:"Hist\xF3ria/Contexto",fullWidth:true,multiline:true,rows:3,value:agentData.backstory,onChange:handleChange('backstory')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{margin:"dense",label:"Sa\xEDda Esperada",fullWidth:true,multiline:true,rows:2,value:agentData.expected_output,onChange:handleChange('expected_output')})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DialogActions,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleClose,color:"secondary",children:"Cancelar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleSubmit,color:"primary",variant:"contained",children:"Salvar Agente"})]})]});};export default AgentModal;
